root_causes: Wrong variable referenced: script uses B4lDKx2 whereas expected logic refers to the multi variable B4lDKx2_5
Because of the variable-name mismatch the validation does not target the intended answer code (5)
instructions: Change the variable in the selection and listing lines from B4lDKx2 to B4lDKx2_5 so the check applies to the multi-coded column (B4lDKx2_5).
Ensure the validation allows only the valid code 5 plus standard special codes (97, 98, 99). For example: sel if (not missing(B4lDKx2_5) and not any(B4lDKx2_5,5,97,98,99)). and list respid B4lDKx2_5.
